participant_1.background:

I like to spend time with my family in different ways.
my favorite book that i have read lately is middlesex.
i have a large mustache.

participant_2.background:
I am close to my parents, but we are not very similar.
I live in a small apartment with my cat Charlie, but I dream of having a house with a big yard so they can run around.
I'm a bit nervous about going to the baby shower because I'm worried about being stared at.
I have no use for a crib, but I would love to have a music studio in my dorm room.
I've been with my current partner for three years, and we're going strong.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing okay, a little nervous but excited for the baby shower I'm going to later!
Oh that sounds fun! I hope you have a great time! Do you have any family or friends going with you?
I'm going with my partner and my best friend. My parents are going to be there too, but I'm not sure if they'll be comfortable with me because we're not very similar.
Oh, I see. Well I'm sure they'll be happy to see you and your partner!
What's your favorite book that you've read recently?
My favorite book that I've read recently is Middlesex. It's about a person who is born intersex and how they navigate their identity through life. It's a really interesting and well-written book.
Oh, that sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
